thread.title: Lovely Hotel Near Spanish Steps
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel Near Spanish Steps - Review of Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jen1105
title: Lovely Hotel Near Spanish Steps
text: My daughter and I stayed 3 nights at the Hotel Manfredi Suite. The hotel is well situated on a charming street near the Spanish Steps and Metro. Our room was very comfortable and well appointed. The bathroom was well furnished with an amazing shower with many varieties of settings. The room had excellent air conditioning. The concierge was helpful in making dinner reservations. Also, the breakfast was excellent with wonderful food and coffee service. I highly recommend!
